description: PHOTOS: 99 homes, 300 apartments proposed near busy Snellville intersection
title: 99 homes, 300 apartments proposed near busy Snellville...
title_page: PHOTOS: 99 homes, 300 apartments proposed near busy Snellville...
text:
1 / 8
A developer is seeking rezoning so it can build 72 single-famly detached homes, 27 townhomes and 300 apartments on Snellville's Webb Gin House Road, not far from Scenic Highway and the Shoppes at Webb Gin retail center. (Photos via zoning application)
